LanguageData.MedievalCivil.label: gentle medieval settlement
LanguageData.MedievalCivil.description:
These people have establish a settlement for a very long time, and advanced to medieval-like society from previous tribes. 

Despite their apparent technological weakness, the medieval settlement can be dangerous enemies and valuable friends because of their skill with low-tech warfare, their numbers, and their hardiness.

This particular medieval settlement pursues a gentle way of life where they can. They are quite open to trade and alliances, even with strange peoples.
LanguageData.MedievalRough.label: savage medieval settlement
LanguageData.MedievalRough.description:
These people have establish a settlement for a very long time, and advanced to medieval-like society from previous tribes. 

Despite their apparent technological weakness, the medieval settlement can be dangerous enemies and valuable friends because of their skill with low-tech warfare, their numbers, and their hardiness.

This particular medieval settlement values warlike dominance; it may be difficult to turn them into an ally.
LanguageData.Medieval_Bandit.label: bandit band
LanguageData.Medieval_Bandit.description:
A group of bandits gathered for their own purposes.

Bandits don't sow, they don't build, and they rarely trade. Driven by a blood-and-honor culture that values personal strength and ruthlessness, they enrich themselves by raiding and robbing their more productive neighbors.

Their technology level depends mostly on who they've managed to steal from recently. They have a preferrance for setting fire.
